Name: Hamster Daily
About the game: The cute hamster ball keeps rolling, advances for her beloved seeds. Hamster Ball can't withstand a collision, don't bump into obstacles. Collecting seeds can make hamsters cute, refueling for more seeds. -Randomly generated levels -Unlock multiple skin types - Support level editor
